title: Hilary (name)
text: Hilary, Hilarie or Hillary is a <a href="given%20name">given</a> and <a href="family%20name">family name</a>, derived from the <a href="Latin">Latin</a> "hilarius" meaning "cheerful", from "hilaris", "cheerful, merry", which comes from the <a href="Greek%20language">Greek</a> ἱλαρός ("hilaros"), "cheerful, merry", which in turn comes from ἵλαος ("hilaos"), "propitious, gracious". <a href="Ilaria%20%28given%20name%29">Ilaria</a> is the popular Italian feminine form, while <a href="Ilario">Ilario</a> is the Italian masculine one. Other male forms are <a href="Hilarion%20%28name%29">Hilarion</a>, <a href="Ilarion">Ilarion</a>, and <a href="Illarion">Illarion</a>.
